description: Explore Arbitrum, a leading Layer 2 solution for Ethereum, focusing on its architecture, benefits, challenges, and the role of the ARB token in scaling and maintaining security.
keywords: Arbitrum, Layer 2, Ethereum, blockchain, ARB Token, optimistic rollups, scalability, decentralized applications, blockchain security, staking, governance
title: Exploring Arbitrum: A Layer 2 Solution and the Role of the ARB Token
